languages.text: "{name}..." {n}Голос Хейнрикса едва слышен.{/n} "Я задержал нас. Прошу простить мою выходку. Пожалуйста, веди нас".
"{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Голос Хейнрикса едва слышен.{/n} "Я задержал нас. Прошу простить мою выходку. Пожалуйста, веди нас".

traits.locale_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}…」{n}ハインリックスの声が、かろうじて聞きとれる。{/n}「待たせたな。怒りを爆発させたことを許してほしい。先導してくれ」
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}…」{n}ハインリックスの声が、かろうじて聞きとれる。{/n}「待たせたな。怒りを爆発させたことを許してほしい。先導してくれ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “{name}……”{n}海因里希的声音几不可闻。{/n}“是我耽误了大家，我恳求你原谅我的冲动。我们继续前进吧。”
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."

traits.locale_text: “{name}……”{n}海因里希的声音几不可闻。{/n}“是我耽误了大家，我恳求你原谅我的冲动。我们继续前进吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {name}... {n}dit Heinrix d'une voix à peine audible.{/n} Je nous ai retardés. Je vous implore de me pardonner mon accès de colère. Passez devant, je vous suis. »
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."

traits.locale_text: « {name}... {n}dit Heinrix d'une voix à peine audible.{/n} Je nous ai retardés. Je vous implore de me pardonner mon accès de colère. Passez devant, je vous suis. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «{name}...». {n}La voz de Heinrix es apenas audible.{/n} «Nos he detenido. Le ruego que perdone este arrebato. Continúe, por favor».
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."

traits.locale_text: «{name}...». {n}La voz de Heinrix es apenas audible.{/n} «Nos he detenido. Le ruego que perdone este arrebato. Continúe, por favor».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name} ..." {n}Heinrixs Stimme ist kaum hörbar.{/n} "Ich habe uns aufgehalten. Verzeiht mir meinen Ausbruch. Bitte. Geht voran."
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."

traits.locale_text: "{name} ..." {n}Heinrixs Stimme ist kaum hörber.{/n} "Ich habe uns aufgehalten. Verzeiht mir meinen Ausbruch. Bitte. Geht voran."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix'in sesi zar zor duyuluyor.{/n} "Benim yüzümden geciktik. Öfkelendiğim için özür dilerim. Affet. Lütfen önden buyur."
languages.original_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix's voice is barely audible.{/n} "I have detained us. I beg you to forgive my outburst. Please lead on."

traits.locale_text: "{name}..." {n}Heinrix'in sesi zar zor duyuluyor.{/n} "Benim yüzümden geciktik. Öfkelendiğim için özür dilerim. Affet. Lütfen önden buyur."
